original_title: 娘の部屋を覗くとき 父の悪戯、疼きだした思〇期の子宮
overview: My daughter is in a rebellious phase and is usually ignored. One day, when I went to the room to call him, I saw him rubbed against him and made him feel good ...! Then, when I mischievously placed a toy in the room and looked at it, I found a comfortable yoga figure there. I can't stand it and my father commits my daughter, and my daughter drowns in my father's cock ... "Dad is not happy, but I like Ji ○ Ji ○ ..."
title: I Peeped Into My Stepsister's Room and Saw Her Getting Fucked by an Older Guy - Chiharu Sakurai
